## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have removed debug/console logs

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have verified there are no new dependencies added (or justified above)
- [ ] All imports use native Node.js modules

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested with multiple Node.js versions (12.x, 14.x, 16.x, 18.x, 20.x)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the TypeScript definitions
- [ ] I have updated or added examples if needed

### Commit History

- [ ] My commits have clear, descriptive messages
- [ ] I have squashed "fix typo" type commits
- [ ] My branch is up to date with main/master
